conversation.speaker: Mimi2
conversation.text: That's right! The cat's out the box now~

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: I don't understand. If you're me, and I'm you, then how... how can we both exist? If I touch you, will the multiverse appear?

conversation.speaker: Mimi2
conversation.text: Ha! It's just like you to say that. To put it plainly, I don't exist. You opened that chest hoping you'd find something, but there's nothing there.

conversation.speaker: Mimi2
conversation.text: You... are such an IDIOT! Are honor and glory so important to you that you'd throw yourself in front of ANY otherwordly terror?

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: What's the big deal anyway? I won, didn't I? The folks back at home will praise me. The Elder Faerie said so herself.

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: With this Master Meowrlin's hat and broom, nothing stands in my way~

conversation.speaker: Mimi2
conversation.text: You'd really just believe anything you hear, don't you?

conversation.speaker: Mimi2
conversation.text: Look what I'm wearing: the old rags from when I was a stray. All that old Meowrlin had to do was put some new colors in, and he had you fooled!

conversation.speaker: Mimi2
conversation.text: Your magic isn't real. Like how those humans drained magic from the faeries, you drain their magic from them.

conversation.speaker: Mimi2
conversation.text: Take the hat off. Put the broom down. You're no hero. Deep down, you're just an insecure. little. phony. No better than those thieving humans.

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: Shut up! I'm not going to take that from you! Do you know who I am? I've beat up more bad guys than you can count on your paws!

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: And what have you done? You've collected enough dust inside that box to make Master Meowrlin a new patch of fur on his head!

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: And so what if my magic's not real? I know that... I've known that my whole life! Yeah, I'm playing pretend, and what's wrong with that? It sucked being a stray!

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: I'm no magical battle cat... I am just Mimi. Mimi, the Whimsical Warrior, and I won't take sassing from you even if that means I'll have to kick your butt too!

conversation.speaker: Mimi2
conversation.text: Pft, is that so? Then my work here is done.
